video.title: Crucial Advice: A Complete Set of Instructions for Dying and in the Bardos - Longchenpa - Dzogchen
video.description:
Powerful, direct and clear instructions for developing awareness at the time of death and for recognising the stages of the bardo - as taught by the Omniscient Master, Longchen Rabjam. The text can be found here: https://www.lotsawahouse.org/tibetan-masters/longchen-rabjam/complete-set-instructions
Translated by Adam Pearcey.

Longchenpa ( ‘Infinite, Vast Expanse of Space’), or Drimé Özer (1308-1364), was one of the most brilliant teachers of the Nyingma lineage. He systematized the Nyingma teachings in his ‘Seven Treasures’ and wrote extensively on Dzogchen. He transmitted the Longchen Nyingtik cycle of teachings and practice to Jikmé Lingpa, and it has since become one of the most widely practiced of traditions.

Music: Mirada - "Tranquility"
